TextBody:
ref:_00D7091pB._500Q000Ha61u:ref

The certificate looks to be installed, but the UI keeps going to https://10.3.4.139/index.php/ instead of https://epp.adtscore.net/index.php.

Have tried on a couple of different machines and browsers, including incognito mode.

Sent: Monday, October 28, 2024 1:41 PM
To: Andy Anderson <aanderson@sambasafety.com>
Subject: Server Admin UI Cert [ ref:!00D70091pB.!500Qk0Ha61u:ref ]


This email originated from outside SambaSafety.
Hi Andy,

We hope you are doing well.

In order to add a SSL Certificate please navigate to the EPP UI > Appliance > Server Maintenance.

Once a .pem SSL Certificate is generated(certificate.pem and key.pem), their content can be pasted in the self signing certificate tabs and then saved.

Please let me know if there is any other information that I can provide.

Best Regards,

Hi Andy,

We hope you are doing well.

In order to add a SSL Certificate please navigate to the EPP UI > Appliance > Server Maintenance.

Once a .pem SSL Certificate is generated(certificate.pem and key.pem), their content can be pasted in the self signing certificate tabs and then saved.

Please let me know if there is any other information that I can provide.
